text: its a very small test data set, but seems like your model works accurately. how was your EDA ? I am curious if you discovered this- if you look at the data in a scatter plot you will see very clear clusters, so its not a big surprise you were able to identify the types with knn.

text:
Given your experience with Deutsche Bank, My question is about the automation of compliance functions' tasks in Germany:
efficiency?
accuracy?
the regulator's consent?

text:
<!channel> while Sian is solving the connection issue, let’s do the following:

• Go to the nested dictionaries block in Notion, download the 4 challenges and try to approach them. The most important one is the 4th, if you feel confident enough go for that one first. Otherwise, start from the beginning it will be a great refresh for python!
• There is also the optional lab on feature engineer. In case you finished with the challenges you can go for it

text: :smile:

For those still looking for vaccine here in Berlin: 

anyone in need of vaccine check this place in Kreuzberg:

>> We have #Astrazeneca und #biontech en mass... just send ur friends and colleagues or whoever... we also accept people without insurance.
Doesn't matter if 1st or 2nd shot, if u want to switch to biontech or stay with astrazeneca.
Just come without appointment, 1 hour before Feierabend each day the latest.
Get vaccinated and stop the delta mutation.
Stop the next wave!!! Stop next lockdown!!
Oppelner Str. 38 Berlin

<https://allgemeinmedizin-oppelner38.de/index.html|https://allgemeinmedizin-oppelner38.de/index.html> <<<
